code: import Nav from'../components/Nav';import AuthModal from"../components/AuthModal";import{useState}from'react';import{useCookies}from"react-cookie";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[showModal,setShowModal]=useState(false);const[isSignUp,setIsSignUp]=useState(true);const[cookies,setCookie,removeCookie]=useCookies(['user']);const authToken=cookies.AuthToken;const handleClick=()=>{if(authToken){removeCookie('UserId',cookies.UserId);removeCookie('AuthToken',cookies.AuthToken);window.location.reload();return;}setShowModal(true);setIsSignUp(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{authToken:authToken,minimal:false,setShowModal:setShowModal,showModal:showModal,setIsSignUp:setIsSignUp}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"primary-title",children:"Swipe Right\xAE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primary-button",onClick:handleClick,children:authToken?'Signout':'Create Account'}),showModal&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthModal,{setShowModal:setShowModal,isSignUp:isSignUp})]})]});};export default Home;
